# Class GraphOutputStream

Represents a handler for a graph execution.

##### Index

### Properties

index isFinished

### Methods

[asyncIterator] next setOnFinished

## Properties

### `Readonly`index

index: number

The index of the execution.

### isFinished

isFinished: boolean = false

Indicates whether the stream has finished producing results.

## Methods

### [asyncIterator]

  * "[asyncIterator]"(): AsyncIterator<[GraphOutputStreamResponse](./graph_GraphOutputStreamResponse.GraphOutputStreamResponse)<any>>

Enables async iteration over graph output responses.

#### Returns AsyncIterator<[GraphOutputStreamResponse](./graph_GraphOutputStreamResponse.GraphOutputStreamResponse)<any>>




### next

  * next(): Promise<[GraphOutputStreamResponse](./graph_GraphOutputStreamResponse.GraphOutputStreamResponse)<any>>

Handles the response from a node.

#### Returns Promise<[GraphOutputStreamResponse](./graph_GraphOutputStreamResponse.GraphOutputStreamResponse)<any>>

A promise that resolves to the response from the node




### setOnFinished

  * setOnFinished(callback: () => void): void

Sets a callback to be called when the stream is finished. This allows automatic cleanup without user intervention.

#### Parameters

    * callback: () => void

Function to call when stream ends

#### Returns void
